FuncDef: The display ssh server-info command displays the binding between the SSH server and the public key (RSA/DSA/ECC/SM2) that has connected or is connecting with current SSH client.
Examples: Server Name(IP)                               Server public key name          Server public key type   State
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the binding between an SSH server and an public key (RSA/DSA/ECC/SM2) on an SSH client is configured, you can run the display ssh server-info command to view the binding information on the SSH client.
